Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Luksuzna kuća sadrži dvije prostrane spavaće sobe, svaka s vlastitim, elegantno uređenim kupatilom opremljenim modernom sanitarnom opremom. Dnevni boravak je prostran, osvijetljen prirodnim svjetlom kroz velika staklena vrata koja vode na terasu, te je uređen u suvremenom stilu sa udobnim namještajem i luksuznim detaljima. Kuhinja je otvorenog plana, potpuno opremljena vrhunskim aparatima i elegantnim radnim površinama, idealna za gurmanske pripreme. Tu je i dodatni WC za goste, smješten u blizini ulaza za dodatnu udobnost. Vanjski prostor nudi prekrasan bazen okružen ležaljkama i zelenilom, pružajući savršen prostor za opuštanje i uživanje na suncu. Kuća je okružena dobro uređenim vrtom, pružajući dodatnu privatnost i osjećaj luksuza. A luxury house featuring two spacious bedrooms, each with its own elegantly designed bathroom equipped with modern fixtures. The living room is large and filled with natural light from the expansive glass doors that open onto the terrace, furnished in a contemporary style with comfortable furniture and luxurious details. The kitchen is open-plan, fully equipped with high-end appliances and stylish countertops, perfect for gourmet cooking. There is also an additional guest WC conveniently located near the entrance. The outdoor area boasts a beautiful swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers and greenery, providing an ideal space for relaxation and enjoyment in the sun. The house is surrounded by a well-maintained garden, offering additional privacy and a sense of luxury.
